bug.question: I am small and black, and I march in a line. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am a very hard worker

bug.question: I have wings and like to fly, and I like sweet things like honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 You can eat the thing I make

bug.question: I am green and hop around. Sometimes I jump very high. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I like to be in green grass
🎶 I sing a song in the evening
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl on the ground. Sometimes you find me in your house! What am I?

hints.text: 🪳 People don't like to see me

bug.question: I fly at night and like the light. Sometimes I bump into things. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I am awake when you are sleeping
🦋 I look a little like a butterfly

bug.question: I can be red or yellow, and I have black spots. What am I?
I live in the ground and make big hills. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I carry things many times my size

bug.question: I make a cozy home of silk, and then I fly away. What am I?
I have a long nose and drink nectar from flowers, and I look like a tiny bird! What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I love to visit colorful blooms
💚 I am mostly active during the day
🦋 I use my long tongue to sip

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am round like a ball.
😎 I only come out during the day.

cosmos.question: I am round and sometimes you can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌚 I don't shine on my own.

cosmos.question: I twinkle way up high and come out at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very, very far away.
🌠 I'm tiny, but there are lots of me.

cosmos.question: I am big and round and you live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 You have a house on me.

cosmos.question: I am what you see when you look up at night. It's black and full of stars! What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 All the planets are in me.

cosmos.question: I am one of many that the Sun is! I am hot and big and far away.
cosmos.explanation: The original question was grammatically incorrect and has been fixed. 'The sun is one of many of me' was changed to 'I am one of many that the Sun is!'

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth. Sometimes I block the Sun!

hints.text: 🌑 I don't have my own light.
🧀 Some people say I'm made of cheese.
🌊 The ocean's tides are affected by me.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars making a picture. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I can be found in the sky.
🐻 One looks like a big bear.
🌠 People used to use me to find their way.

cosmos.question: I am a cold place full of ice. I orbit the Sun!

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of rock and ice.
☄️ I have a tail when I get close to the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am very, very big, and have lots of stars, dust, and gas. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I am bigger than our solar system.
✨ Our Sun is part of me.
